metadata.title: Easy Cucamelon Pickle | South Indian Style Recipe | Mouse Melon Recipe
metadata.description: Cucamelons are also called mouse melons, Mexican sour cucumbers or Mexican sour gherkins. Popular in Mexico & Central America. I grew cucamelon plant in my backyard (Canada), the best crop in my garden; harvesting cucamelons every day. I turned cucamelons into a South Indian style pickle.
